name: places/ChIJBTs3d15ZwokRAsfzLPFudOA
formattedAddress: 1266 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1266 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10128-0516, USA

originalText.text:
We were appealed by the adorable looking
of Hot Chocolate from Glacé by Noglu and decided to give it a try even though there was a long line.

Due to the long line, there were only 2 ice cream options available: vanilla or brownie and we chose vanilla as our first try.

Their Hot Chocolate Sundae was really adorable as the photo. It was hot chocolate topped with marshmallow & vanilla ice cream. The taste was rich and creamy but easy to get greasy.

text.text:
We were appealed by the adorable looking
of Hot Chocolate from Glacé by Noglu and decided to give it a try even though there was a long line.

Due to the long line, there were only 2 ice cream options available: vanilla or brownie and we chose vanilla as our first try.

Their Hot Chocolate Sundae was really adorable as the photo. It was hot chocolate topped with marshmallow & vanilla ice cream. The taste was rich and creamy but easy to get greasy.

originalText.text: As you can see to get the famous hot chocolate you have to wait for a little bit. I’ve been in line for 25 minutes. Got the hot chocolate sundae with nutella ice cream. It was good and very pretty, I got asked 2-3 times where I got it and if it’s worth the wait. If you’ll get the ones with ice cream like I did, you will have to drink a lot of it in a short time the hot chocolate melts the ice into the cup and overflows, made a little mess. Was way sweeter than I expected, but it was a nice experience.

text.text: As you can see to get the famous hot chocolate you have to wait for a little bit. I’ve been in line for 25 minutes. Got the hot chocolate sundae with nutella ice cream. It was good and very pretty, I got asked 2-3 times where I got it and if it’s worth the wait. If you’ll get the ones with ice cream like I did, you will have to drink a lot of it in a short time the hot chocolate melts the ice into the cup and overflows, made a little mess. Was way sweeter than I expected, but it was a nice experience.

originalText.text: Peppermint hot chocolate is my personal favorite, the s’mores hot chocolate aims to please, ice cream flavors delight (I’m partial to the mint chocolate chip). Whip cream is second to none; absolutely divine. The waiting time to enter was quite long (15-20 min) but staff inside was extremely helpful and personable. It’s not very large so most everyone will be eating as they leave. You’ll wish you could get this regularly

text.text: Peppermint hot chocolate is my personal favorite, the s’mores hot chocolate aims to please, ice cream flavors delight (I’m partial to the mint chocolate chip). Whip cream is second to none; absolutely divine. The waiting time to enter was quite long (15-20 min) but staff inside was extremely helpful and personable. It’s not very large so most everyone will be eating as they leave. You’ll wish you could get this regularly

originalText.text: The hot chocolate here was really good but I at too overpriced for me. The line is usually long but it goes pretty fast. The service is okay. They kind of rush you out. The marshmallow is really heavy so it’s hard to finish. But overall good hot chocolate. They should give you more.

text.text: The hot chocolate here was really good but I at too overpriced for me. The line is usually long but it goes pretty fast. The service is okay. They kind of rush you out. The marshmallow is really heavy so it’s hard to finish. But overall good hot chocolate. They should give you more.

originalText.text:
This is to those who are going for the Viral Hot Chocolate: Come early, because if the line is going to take more than 45 minutes, it's not worth it.

I arrived 30 minutes before it opened to check the lines and there were already 15 to 20 people there. Once it opened, the line went around the block.

The drink itself is beautiful and very aesthetically pleasing, makes for great social media posts. The hot chocolate was nothing special, similar to what you can get at any other cafe. The drink is already sweetened, and it gets even sweeter with the marshmallow toppings/whipped cream. It would work better with a dark hot chocolate that's more bitter.

My recommendation is to at least try the ice cream since that's what the spot was known for before the hot chocolate. Also go visit the Noglu bakery just 3 doors down, you'll find it a better use of your time.

Staff is awesome though.
